createdTime.description: The time that the folder was created.

folderPaths.description: An array of ancestor ARN strings for the folder. Empty for root-level folders.

folderType.description: The type of folder. By default, it is `SHARED`. Valid values are: `SHARED`.

lastUpdatedTime.description: The time that the folder was last updated.

name.description:
Display name for the folder.

The following arguments are optional:

parentFolderArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the parent folder. If not set, creates a root-level folder.

permissions.description: A set of resource permissions on the folder. Maximum of 64 items. See permissions.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
